title: (x) By the Gate of the Sea - hand written {Dan}
content:
Mike Yanega suggested I try here to find out what font this might be. Have exhaused all other possibilities.   
   
Jean   
   
 ![TheGoldenSea-ID?](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141509im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/21873.jpg)
author: jeanne11

comments.content: Jean, do you have any other samples? Look at the first e and compare it to the other e's its different and the ink is lighter on the thins than the thicks I bet a Calligraphy pen created this gem.
If this indeed, is hand-written, perhaps someone might know of a font that is similar?

I have to agree, seeing more text, that this is hand-drawn. My suggestion would be to look through the samples in [part 5 of the Script Font ID Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141509/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script05Pg1.html) for something that seems similar in feel. The Supplier codes in the linked Script Font Reference List can help you find who sells the fonts.
